alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:07PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Broomfield, northwestern Adams and southeastern Boulder Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 507 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Boulder, or 24 miles northwest of Denver, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thornton, Westminster, Boulder, Broomfield, northwestern Commerce City, Northglenn, Brighton, Lafayette, Louisville, Erie, Superior, Federal Heights, Fort Lupton, Dacono, Todd Creek and Eldorado Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
